name: ConcussionCareNewsfromImPACTApplications
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: If you care about your health, your brain wellness is a no brainer. This is your hub to learn how to best take care of your brain. We’ll discuss everything surrounding concussions: from stories of people who’ve had one and recovered from it, to current news and research on how concussions happen and how they’re treated. We’ll update you weekly with the information you need to ensure you and your loved ones know what to do if a concussion ever happens. The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
